20101229070626.000|20101229070632.000|CC1|MADE $100,000.                  
20101229070632.000|20101229070635.000|CC1|IN 1943, THE CAPONE GUYS RAN HIM
20101229070635.000|20101229070638.000|CC1|OUT OF CHICAGO TO MEXICO.

20101229071000.000|20101229071001.000|CC1|BACK TO THE PRODUCING THING,    
20101229071001.000|20101229071006.000|CC1|WHAT IS THE TRICK?              
20101229071006.000|20101229071008.000|CC1|>> AT THE TIME, I WAS AN        
20101229071008.000|20101229071010.000|CC1|ARRANGER.                       
20101229071010.000|20101229071013.000|CC1|I DID NOT GET PAID ONE CENT IN  
20101229071013.000|20101229071013.000|CC1|ROYALTIES.                      
20101229071013.000|20101229071015.000|CC1|I DID NOT KNOW WHAT A PRODUCER
